The best sangria in Barcelona...no contest!  And it's organic.  The place is small and authentically quaint.  The menu is entirely vegetarian and delicious.  The sarda four seasons is a 'best ever'..the use of olive oil and sesame seeds is really delicious and I wish I could take this place home with me.  A great place to lose yourself for a couple of hours in the middle of the afternoon.  The music is great and totally chill. A true gem!
